column5: On this taught programme, you’ll gain an understanding of the environmental implications of development action and of the wider social, political and economic issues surrounding decisions about the environment.INTRODUCTIONAcross a series of compulsory and optional modules, you’ll develop advanced environmental planning and management skills – along with the relationships and inherent challenges to overcome to plan for a healthy society.
column7: UK fees (applies to Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland) Full-time place, per year - £10,400 Part-time place, per year - £5,200  International fees Full-time place, per year - £21,400 Part-time place, per year - £10,700
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
